description:
Mai has rebounded from her previous loss to Jonouchi to become a better duelist.  Has Yugi learned from his loss to Kaiba, or is the emotional defeat still weighing on his heart?  The answer is in the cards!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Densetsu no Saikyou Senshi Chaos Soldier Kourin
The Legendary Strongest Warrior Black Luster Soldier Descends
伝説の最強戦士カオス・ソルジャー降臨
